com.buschmais.jqassistant.scm.maven

Class AbstractAnalysisMojo

  • java.lang.Object
    • org.apache.maven.plugin.AbstractMojo
      • com.buschmais.jqassistant.scm.maven.AbstractAnalysisMojo
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    org.apache.maven.plugin.ContextEnabled, org.apache.maven.plugin.Mojo
    Direct Known Subclasses:
    AnalyzeMojo, AvailableRulesMojo, EffectiveRulesMojo, ExportDatabaseMojo, ExportRulesMojo, ResetMojo, ScanMojo, ServerMojo

    public abstract class AbstractAnalysisMojo
extends org.apache.maven.plugin.AbstractMojo
    Abstract base implementation for analysis mojos.
